title: 6 Tips to Prepare for a Snow Storm Homesteader Style
itunes:title: 6 Tips to Prepare for a Snow Storm Homesteader Style
description: How to prepare for a snow storm or any extreme weather emergency on your homestead without running to the stores or heading out into the weather. Melissa shares the exact steps she goes through when a storm is on the way, including livestock prep. Get the blog post and full show notes for this episode at https://melissaknorris.com/170

itunes:subtitle: Be Ready for Any Storm
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
